company: S.H.K. Real Estate Management Company Limited
description:
三A級運作助理 (醫院保安) - (參考編號: HKEC220102)


職位空缺通告 - 港島東醫院聯網HKEC220102


職位 ： 三A級運作助理 (醫院保安)


工作地點：港島東醫院聯網 (東區尤德夫人那打素醫院 / 律敦治及鄧肇堅醫院 / 東華東院 / 黃竹坑醫院 / 舂磡角慈氏護養院 / 普通科門診)


薪酬 ： 月薪港幣14,031元至17,733元 (見備註二)


職責
(一) 履行院方保安政策及措施。
(二) 執行日常保安工作，包括巡邏醫院範圍、職員宿舍和各建築物。
(三) 監管往來及停泊在醫院範圍內的車輛及指引訪客。
(四) 提供適切的客戶服務，如解答訪客的詢問。
(五) 處理及報告未經許可而逗留醫院範圍內的人士及其他緊急事故。
(六) 維持病人排隊秩序，擔任特別護送/守衛職務，並須與院內各部門及院外機構作出配合及協調。
(七) 操作、使用及監察保安器材及停車場系統。
(八) 協助處理違例吸煙事件及工作間暴力事故。
(九) 負責火警安全、環境保護、危機處理及職安健管理。
(十) 操作及進行擬定及突發之事故應變工作。
(十一) 協助保安主任或上級編訂所有保安人員之當值更期表及安排替假。
(十二) 執行醫院管理局附例。
(十三) 預備及提交報告予院方管理層。
(十四) 執行上級指派的其他職務。


資歷
(一) 中三程度或具同等學歷 (見備註一)。
(二) 持有由香港警務處（牌照課）簽發的有效保安人員許可証。
(三) 能書寫中文及講流利粵語，閱讀及明白簡單英文。


申請者若具備以下條件可獲優先考慮
(一) 懂基本電腦操作。
(二) 持有消防大使 / 急救証書 / 工作間暴力事故証書或相關特別技能証書。
(三) 具有客戶服務經驗。
(四) 能講簡單普通話及英語。


備註


HA內部申請者
(一) 能讀寫中文及簡單英文，操流利粵語及簡單英文及具有三年醫管局保安員經驗者亦可被考慮。
(二) 合適之申請者會視乎其現在的受聘形式以合約或固定期委任形式受聘，為期一至三年，而薪酬則會根據他們現在的薪酬配套/聘用條款和現行政策而訂。


外部申請者
(三) 合適之申請者，將以合約形式受聘為期一至三年，完成合約後並工作表現良好者，可獲合約期內的月薪總額5%為約滿酬金。
(四) 即將退休/已退休的醫管局員工若希望於正常退休後受重聘於醫管局亦可投考。如獲選受重聘，將根據醫管局現行退休後重聘機制的僱用條款受聘。


所有申請者
(五) 須二十四小時輪班工作，並在颱風、暴雨及其他緊急事故時按需要返回工作崗位當值。
(六) 受聘人在當值時須穿著制服，並可能須佩帶N95口罩及穿著個人保護裝備。
(七) 因應醫院管理局的服務需要，受聘人或需被調派至其他工作地點工作。
(八) 續約與否，將視乎醫院運作需要及員工工作表現。
(九) 請在2023年1月3日或之前提出申請，連同醫院管理局職位申請表HA(G)13及夾附有關證明文件副本送交：


香港柴灣樂民道3號
東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
綜合大樓C座2字樓
港島東聯網人力資源部； 或
透過網上系統登入並遞交網上申請表格。
請注意，如你已經紙張提交本職位的申請，則毋須再次提交此網上申請表，以避免重覆申請。在透過互聯網開始申請時，請確認你並沒有經紙張提交本職位的申請。


如有查詢，請致電2595 6965 或 2595 6516。

company: China Merchants Shipping and Enterprises Co Ltd
description:
Scope of Duties: 

Oversee the discipline and performance of HAECO in-house security teams
Oversee the discipline and performance of Contractor Security Guards (AVSECO and Nam Tai Security)
Handling the administrative works (notification / investigation / appeal / reply /statistics) in relation to the Breach of Apron Disciplines (Traffic Offence); Airport Safety Demerit and Breach of Conditions of Issue of Permits committed by HAECO staff
Represent HAECO at Airport Emergency Centre once activated to deal with security incidents related to HAECO
Take charge of the quality assurance issues of the security systems and equipment through regular testing on CCTVs; intrusion detection systems and maintaining relevant records
Deliver fire and security trainings to HAECO staff
Coordinating and monitoring of fire risk assessment
Assist ad hoc project as assigned
Act as the overall in-charge of Security & Fire Services Department in the absence of the Manager and the Head of Section (Security)
Deputize Head of Section (Security) as and when necessary
Act on behalf of the Head of Section (Security) to process all HAECO temporary TRA permits

Requirements: 

Diploma or above in any disciplines
Minimum of 7 years of security experience of which at least 5 years at a supervisory role
A valid Security Personnel Permit
Previous experience in Law enforcement/Fire services/Fire safety is an advantage
Aviation security related experience
Sound physical security job knowledge and investigation technique
Ability to perform under pressure and strong capacity for decision making
Good leadership skill and strong organizational ability
Excellent command of English and Chinese, both spoken and written

How to Apply

Please send your resume with expected salary, quoting the employer's reference no., to: Human Resources Department - Talent & Partnership Team, Hong Kong Aircraft Engineering Company Limited, 80 South Perimeter Road, Hong Kong International Airport, Lantau, Hong Kong OR submit your application via https://careers.haeco.com/hkg/job-openings/

Candidates not contacted 4-6 weeks after submission of applications and/or interviews may consider their application unsuccessful.

All information provided by candidates will be treated in strict confidence and will be used for employment purpose only.

job_title: Assistant Security Supervisor / Senior Security Guard / Security Guard 助理保安主任 / 資深保安員 / 保安員
description:
The Job

Partner with Operations team and stakeholders to prevent theft and reduce shrinkage
Response to store crime, emergency, internal fraud, and LP incidents
Conduct daily anti-crime operations (include CCTV capturing, study shrinkage report, culprits matching, intelligence collection, known theft items analysis, security alarm & CCTV checking)
In-charge of fraud investigation and report submission
Assist in preparing memo circulation whenever incidents occurred
Visit stores regularly and attend district meeting to deliver LP message to strengthen store LP awareness
Work with Law enforcement for crime prevention, including reply court warrant, share theft intelligence

The People

F. 5 or above
Holder of Personnel Security Permit
High degree of discipline and integrity
2-3 years’ security or loss prevention supervisory experience in retail business would be an advantage
Good initiative, teamwork, and interpersonal skill
Able to work independently, good time management and complete tasks within timeline
Proactive, well organized, able to handle multi-tasks and work under pressure
Proficient in MS Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Teams, and SharePoint
Good command of spoken and written both in English and Chinese

The Department
The Betting Operations Control Centre (BOCC) of our Betting Control and Customer Operations Department is the main co-ordination and service centre for all business channels under the Customer and International Business Development Division. It provides 7x24 operations to maintain quality and efficient services and support to Retail, Telebet and Interactive Services and acts as the central control point for all wagering products and activities.

The Job
You will

assist in managing the day-to-day operations of the Betting Operations Control Centre (BOCC)
supervise a team of staff members to provide efficient services and support to internal customers around the clock
ensure smooth operations in all Betting/Information systems
participate in project development and implementation.

About You
You should have

have a degree with a minimum of 6 years' operational experience at supervisory level in a control centre like environment
be dynamic, energetic and self-motivated
knowledge of horse racing and football betting will be an advantage
excellent communication and interpersonal skills in both English and Chinese
ability to work independently and be willing to work on 24-hr shift and be willing to travel to other countries within the region.

Terms of Employment
The level of appointment will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.


How to Apply

Please send your resume, complete with expected salary and job reference by clicking the Apply Now button or to:
Fax: 2576-1987
Mail: The Human Resources Department, The Hong Kong Jockey Club, 1 Sports Road, Happy Valley, Hong Kong

We are an equal opportunity employer. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used strictly in accordance with the Club's notice to employees and prospective employees relating to the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance. A copy of which will be provided immediately upon request.
selling_points: assist in managing the day-to-day operations
supervise a team of staff members

This is a Security Officer position under the supervision of the Security Supervisor. The main duties are to ensure the safety and provide protection for the Soho House’s employees, customers, and property at the Soho House Hong Kong. He/She also works with various departments to facilitate the building operations. The role is expected to:
Perform security duties at the Soho House Hong Kong
Perform building operations and events operation duties
Familiarization with all aspects of the building, particularly to all emergency systems
Patrol the site with particular emphasis on security, safety, repair and maintenance
Manage crowd management duties during events
Implement access control to prevent unauthorized access
Handle emergency situation according to the emergency procedure
Duties sequence will be based on shift duties and special duties fixed shift (if requires)
Report to Security Supervisor on patrolling report and daily occurrence
Perform all duties as directed by his/her superior
What we look for...
Possess no less than two-year full-time security experience
Security experience with property management, customer services or hotel is preferable

description:
Would you like to join the G4S elite screening team as a Security Screener and contribute to the air cargo security and the prosperity of Hong Kong air cargo industry.
Following the international enhancement requirement of air cargo security, the demands for air cargo screening has increased significantly, and G4S is now looking for suitable candidates to join our Aviation and Logistics Division as Security Screeners to meet the expanding demands from our clients of the Regulated Air Cargo Screening Facility (RACSF). 
As the international requirement specified that the implementation to be in place by 1st July 2021, hence security screening posts are on the rising trend. As such Security Screener is a stable career and with good opportunity for advancement to higher posts. Prior to screening deployment, G4S will provide comprehensive training on air cargo screening using x-ray equipment and physical search.
One should possess the following criteria for applying the post of G4S Security Screener :
(a) General Criteria
are self motivated and hard working, and can perform screening on your own
have an aptitude for operating security equipment
are able to communicate in Cantonese
possess a high standard of appearance and deportment 
be able to produce documentary proofs of at least 5 year of previous employment history
able to produce criminal conviction history if any
there is no restriction in employment in Hong Kong
 (b) Educational Criteria
Attained at least a minimum educational level of Secondary 5 or equivalent
(c) Medical Criteria
have good general health, reasonable strength and no physical incapability
with or without spectacles or contact lenses, be able to read correctly vehicle number plate at 25m distance and be able to read labels on bottles of spirits and aerosols at a distance selected by the medical examiner between 30 to 50cm
have normal colour perception through Ishihara's test and Edridge-Green lantern test
have a capacity to detect by smell a range of substances including petrol, ammonia, alcoholic drinks and explosive materials (similar to the essence of almonds, oil of cloves)
with or without aid, be able to hear radio and telephone communications, audio signals emitted by security equipment, and an average of conversational human voice at a distance of 2.5m in a quiet room, and 
be free from dependence on alcohol or illegal drugs. 
As a Security Screener, you are required to
perform security screening of air cargo in shift duty
wear uniform
the other usual stuff.............
